title: I'm stuck on a game that it's over
body:
*UPDATE* for me and apparently for many others is working now, so let's just chill.

I can't play because I'm apparently still in a game, but I'm not because its over and I only get the Reconnect option, which will not take me to the game, because off course: The game its over.

After waiting a while the game just tries to reconnect, and restarting isn't working.

Any advice?

[Just the reconnect button](https://imgur.com/7poyu1C)

replies.body: I'm having the same issue and uninstalling and reinstalling did nothing :(

Hang in there, take a break, do something nice like eating something good, take a nap, read something you wanted to read or call a friend, then come back and if its not fixed, rinse and repeat. We will survive ;D

I'm having the exact same problem...account in "limbo" after finishing a ranked game. Skipped the end game stats due to them not loading, exited client, restarted, and now in an endless loop of black screen telling me it's "trying to reconnect me" to a game that's not even there. I posted a ticket about it, but haven't heard anything yet.

I'm having the same exact issues after a ranked game too, and i tried re-installing still didnt fix it

We've been seeing these ghost games more often than usual today, but we've got some guys working a bit of overtime to see if we can get this all straightened out and set right as quickly as possible. I know this is hella frustrating, but unfortunately, all we can do at this point is wait for those games to clear out.

Glad you were able to get back in the game!
My boyfriend and I have been stuck in ghost games for over 3 hours now

Also had the same issue. Finished a game about 3 hours ago and the server still tries to reconnect me as if I'm still in the match. To all those reinstalling, don't bother, this is a server side issue, this isn't a problem with your game files. PLEASE FIX THIS RIOT...
yea same i  even deleted and reinstalled and still nothing
My friend and I have the same issue as of a few hours ago. I figured it might pass since the game has been over for hours, but after checking again, still in limbo.

Yeah, so far many people seem to have the same issue, reinstalling, trouble shooting, don't work. 

Guess now we wait and see. Hopefully not for long
